name: Palmr
description: Palmr is a fast and secure platform for sharing files, built with performance and privacy in mind.
author: Kyantech

form_fields.label: Language
form_fields.hint: Default language for the application (optional, defaults to en-US)

form_fields.label: Simultaneous downloads
form_fields.hint: Maximum number of simultaneous downloads (auto-scales based on system memory if not set)

form_fields.label: Active memory management
form_fields.hint: Minimum file size before enabling active memory management (1.0,2.0,3.0)

form_fields.label: Reverse proxy
form_fields.hint: Enabling behind reverse proxy (false or true)
